fields.title: About Gift Roulette
fields.content:
What

Gift Roulette is an anonymous gift curation service.

Send yourself, friends, or strangers something unique based on your preferences. Each gift is hand selected by one the Gift Roulette agents and you or the recipient will probably love it.

The project addresses customers comfort making sight unseen purchases on the internet. As brick and mortar stores decay, how will online shopping behaviors become less tangible and more conveniences.

How

When a gift request is submitted, one of our product agents is notified and they will immediately take great consideration in your filters to select the perfect gift. Our agents are expertly trained and shipments will be sent out same day from a growing list of online shopping resources. The cost of the product will be approximately 90% of the price tier.

Who
